starvationevasion.common

Class PolicyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.common.PolicyManager

  • public class PolicyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The PolicyManager class is a service provider that aggregates and provides all of the available policy cards found in the VM's classpath. The Policy class is abstract and can not be instantiated directly. Policy objects are created from Policy cards by the policy manager. To get an instance of a policy manager : 
     
 PolicyManager pm = PolicyManager.getPolicyManager();
    The policy manager creates a Policy from either a PolicyCard or from an identifier provided by the server : 
     
 Policy policy = pm.createPolicy(identifier, region);
    Created by peter on 11/17/2015.

      • validate

        public java.lang.String validate(PolicyCard card,
                                 EnumRegion region,
                                 int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int z,
                                 EnumFood targetFood,
                                 EnumRegion targetRegion)
        Validates a policy card given the provided settings. Some policy cards require quantity X, Y and/or Z. The units of these values depend on the particular policy. The respective field is ignored if the named policy does not require that field. The targetFood field is ignored if the named policy does not require a target food. Some cards require the target region to be a US player region. Other cards require the target region to be a non-player world region. The targetRegion field is ignored if the named policy does not require a target region.
        Parameters:
        card - A playing card.
        region - The implementing region.
        targetFood - The target food.
        targetRegion - The target region.
        x - The value to apply to X.
        y - The value to apply to Y.
        z - The value to apply to Z.
        Returns:
        A text string indicating the error, or null if the card and associated parameters are valid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - policyName is not a valid Fall 2015 policy name.

      • validate

        public java.lang.String validate(java.lang.String policyName,
                                 EnumRegion region,
                                 int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int z,
                                 EnumFood targetFood,
                                 EnumRegion targetRegion)
        Validates a policy card given the provided settings. Some policy cards require quantity X, Y and/or Z. The units of these values depend on the particular policy. The respective field is ignored if the named policy does not require that field. The targetFood field is ignored if the named policy does not require a target food. Some cards require the target region to be a US player region. Other cards require the target region to be a non-player world region. The targetRegion field is ignored if the named policy does not require a target region.
        Parameters:
        policyName - The policy name.
        region - The implementing region.
        targetFood - The target food.
        targetRegion - The target region.
        x - The value to apply to X.
        y - The value to apply to Y.
        z - The value to apply to Z.
        Returns:
        A text string indicating the error, or null if the card and associated parameters are valid.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - policyName is not a valid Fall 2015 policy name.
